Summary Since 1999 Matt has worked on the front line of digital media. Starting at Yahoo! He served as project manager their Inventory Management System and, later, in Europe, as their head of pricing and yield management. From 2005 to 2012 he ran the global ad operations community AdMonsters, delivering dozens of events a year to help elevate the role of advertising operations and technology. 
 
Since leaving AdMonsters in 2012, Matt has run Teemo UK, a media technology consultancy in London. His clients include France Telecom / Unanimis, Adbrain, Adform, Pixalate, DistroScale, and DigitasLBi.  
 
He's a frequent speaker, panelist, and chair at conferences including Digiday, IAB, dmexco, AOP (UK), Admangerforum, AdMonsters and corporate-operated events. He is an active advisor and investor in advertising and marketing technology start-ups  and an active partner at AtlanticLeap. Summary Since 1999 Matt has worked on the front line of digital media. Summary Accomplished, results-oriented digital media executive with 15+ years industry experience, and a proven track record of maximizing digital efficiencies, increasing advertising revenues, and exceeding goals. Currently seeking new opportunities. 
 
As Senior Director of Product Sales & Operations, my role was a hybrid position that encompassed a combination of product marketing, advertising operations, and direct sales responsibilities. It focused on the AOL Homepage as a unique 'Product' that was available within the AOL Advertising portfolio. As the product expert for AOL Homepages, I managed: 
 
•	Product positioning for multiple ad products  
•	Pricing strategy & rate negotiations 
•	Sales conflicts/inventory demand 
•	New product launches and revenue streams 
•	Ad performance, benchmarking and best practices 
•	Post campaign reporting 
•	Competitive tracking and analyses 
•	Trouble shooting ad issues 
•	Sales calls with clients and ad agencies.  
 
I strategized with sales teams to provide optimal, cross-platform (desktop/tablet/smartphone) ad solutions for all industry categories. I was responsible for driving overall advertising revenue to the AOL Homepage, and consistently increased revenue and exceeded sales goals, despite a steadily declining unique visitor audience.
